solution_line_template: The second building is two times as tall as the first building, a total of {first_building_height}*{second_building_multiplier} = <<{first_building_height}*{second_building_multiplier}={second_building_height}>>{second_building_height} feet.

The total height of the first and the second building is {second_building_height}+{first_building_height} = <<{second_building_height}+{first_building_height}={total_first_second}>>{total_first_second} feet.

The third building is three times as tall as the combined height of the first and second buildings, which is {total_first_second}*{third_building_multiplier} = <<{total_first_second}*{third_building_multiplier}={third_building_height}>>{third_building_height} feet.
Together, the three buildings have a total height of {third_building_height}+{total_first_second} = <<{third_building_height}+{total_first_second}={total_height}>>{total_height} feet.
